content.rendered:
What’s Next for Salesforce in 2020?
Dreamforce Highlights from MVPsNovember 2019


Overview

Just because you have the world’s #1 customer success platform, doesn’t mean you experience all its value. Learn strategies for making the most of your Salesforce investment based on the key announcements at the greatest learning event of the year – Dreamforce 2019. Salesforce MVPs, AI enthusiasts, futurists, and sceptics uncover what’s next for Salesforce across Sales, Service, Marketing, and IT. Featuring Leyna Hoffer, Shivanath Devinarayanan, Meighan Brodkey, Mohith Shrivastava, Rakesh Gupta, Jean Michel Mougeolle, Amit Chaudhary, Jan Vandevelde, Atul Gupta, Fabrice Cathala, Eric Dreshfield.

Resources


YouTube Video



View Video

Featuring…

excerpt.rendered:
Salesforce MVPs, AI enthusiasts, futurists, and sceptics uncover what’s next for Salesforce across Sales, Service, Marketing, and IT.

Featuring Leyna Hoffer, Shivanath Devinarayanan, Meighan Brodkey, Mohith Shrivastava, Rakesh Gupta, Jean Michel Mougeolle, Amit Chaudhary, Jan Vandevelde, Atul Gupta, Fabrice Cathala, Eric Dreshfield.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce 2017
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Dreamforce 2017 presentation, What happens when an Admin, an “Admineloper” and a Salesforce Developer discuss what really matters to them? 3 devoted Salesforce pros share experiences & offer tips to devs that would take months (or years) to learn. Learn common misunderstandings btw Admins & Developers, gotchas & more

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce Admin & Dev Recap
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join us as 3 Salesforce MVP‘s, Eric Dreshfield, Mike Martin, and Meighan Brodkey, bring Dreamforce ‘19 to you. Our Dreamforce19 recap panel will answer the questions you want to know about the best admin/dev sessions, favorite tips and takeaways and more.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce 18
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: October 2018[addtoany buttons=’Twitter,facebook,linkedin,email’] Overview This Dreamforce I was honored to present 3 different sessions.Decoding Developers from DF17 was back! Sadly Leslie was unable to join us, but Jean and I presented with Ashley Allen.Then I had the Community Demo Jam where I completed against Nathan Pepper showing off our custom…
